document_data.name: Lharathuel Hesmyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Lharathuel Hesmyr''' was a [[human]] [[cleric]] of [[Chauntea]] in the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/55/The Everwinking Eye: A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye|24}}
document_data.Activities: In the late 1350s DR, she led services at the [[House of Plenty (Maskyr's Eye)|House of Plenty]] temple and had two acolytes: [[Torzhin Hulvesper]], the youngest son of a local horse-breeder, and [[Jhenta Sulpir]], who'd escaped an arranged marriage in [[Teziir]]. They were available to provide healing to the farmers.
